text: This is a list of Danish television related events from 1991. ==Events== *16 March - Anders Frandsen is selected to represent Denmark at the 1991 Eurovision Song Contest with his song "Lige der hvor hjertet slår". He is selected to be the twenty-fourth Danish Eurovision entry during Dansk Melodi Grand Prix held at the Musikhuset in Aarhus. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Births== ==Deaths== ==See also== *1991 in Denmark
title: 1991 in Danish television
